physical_examinations.relevant_findings: The patient was detached from reality, had compulsive rituals, and exhibited poor eye contact.
Inappropriate posturing of the left arm noted.
More assertive and less fearful of peers, but still had a rigid approach to learning and poor language skills.
Posture was slumped with chin resting on chest, speech was slurred and barely audible, difficulty swallowing solid foods.
Noted to tire easily, extraocular muscles affected.
physical_examinations.changes_over_time: Diagnosis of myasthenia gravis was established.

physical_examinations.relevant_findings: Posture normalized, more articulate speech, improved alertness and swallowing ability. Increased communication and assertiveness noted.
physical_examinations.changes_over_time: Significant improvement in emotional relating to others after treatment.

physical_examinations.relevant_findings: Continued excellent progress; discharged from treatment.
physical_examinations.changes_over_time: No signs of schizophrenia since 1970; now described as perfectionistic or obsessive-compulsive.
